reviews.text: Great place and wonderful people!  Rini is the best!  I always have a great time here.
This is the first spot I came to when I moved to the area, and I keep coming back. Super solid prices, multiple vegetarian and non-alcoholic options. Free...
Had lunch there today.  Two servers working, a blond who made eye contact and was attentive to her tables and then ours...brunette who looked down  at...
